definition: musical activity i.e. singing, whistling, playing an instrument and so on
details:
noun
- musical activity i.e. singing, whistling, playing an instrument and so on
= example: musical activity i.e. singing, whistling, playing an instrument and so on
- punishment for one's actions
= example: punishment for one's actions
= synonyms: medicine
- pleasing and harmonious sounds
= example: pleasing and harmonious sounds
= synonyms: euphony
- (music) the sounds produced by singers or musical instruments (or reproductions of such sounds)
- an artistic form of auditory communication incorporating instrumental or vocal tones in a structured and continuous manner
